plays.text: Goal scored by Radim Vrbata assisted by Chris Drury and Todd Gill
Penalty to Brian Willsie 2 minutes for Tripping Andy Delmore
Penalty to Joe Sakic 2 minutes for Hooking Vladimir Orszagh
Penalty to Stephane Yelle 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Martin Erat 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Chris Drury
Goal scored by Scott Hartnell unassisted
Penalty to Pascal Trepanier 2 minutes for Elbowing Martin Erat
Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for Roughing Pascal Trepanier
Goal scored by Vitali Yachmenev assisted by David Legwand and Kimmo Timonen
Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by JEFF DAW and Patrick Roy
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for High Sticking Mark Mowers
Goal scored by Scott Hartnell assisted by Cliff Ronning and Greg Johnson
Penalty to Vladimir Orszagh 2 minutes for Interference Ville Nieminen
Goal scored by Denis Arkhipov assisted by Andy Delmore
Penalty to Riku Hahl 2 minutes for High Sticking Bill Houlder
Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for High Sticking Stephane Yelle
Goal scored by Tom Fitzgerald assisted by Greg Johnson and Bill Houlder
